infoIconTooltip: Allows to define Custom Tables which can be used with multiple commands at CAD side.
columnIsEmptyMessage: The column value cannot be blank. Please select a column.
addValidTableNameMessage: Please enter a valid table name.
addUniqueTableNameMessage: Table name already in use. Please enter a different table name.
tableIsUsedByConnectorsMessage: Table is used by connectors. It can not be deleted.
deleteCustomTableFailureMessage: Failure in deleting custom table. Please contact your administrator.
